Hololive_TheStar.NAME: Hololive
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat,if you have any combination, choose an ability. NL for every 4 combinations you have, the number of ability choices increases once.
NL 1. #yManji :Whenever you play a attack card,give +1/+1 to random vtuber.
NL 2. #yNatsuiroFubuki :Gain 4 #yYeah+ .
NL 3. #yPekoMiko :Every time you gain Gold ,apply 1 Poison to random enemy.
NL 4. #yGamers :Copy your draw pile and shuffle into your discard pile.
NL 5. #yHappyFamily :Whenever you play a summon card,the leftmost vtuber attacks once.
NL 6. #yBlondHair :Gain 3 DurableLive.
NL 7. #meaqua :no effect currently
NL 8. #yfams :All your cards cost 1 less this turn.
NL 9. #yCatAndDog :Summon #yPinotaurs .
NL 10. #yNewCatAndDog :All enemies gain 4 #rFlare .
NL 11. #bAquaMarine :Gain 15 #yGold .
NL 12. #bSoraA :Whenever you play a colorless card,gain [E] .
NL 13. #bMatsuriShion :Whenever you draw a summon card,change it to 7/7 and cost 1.
NL 14.Noel #rFlare :At the end of your turn,give the vtuber with the lowest HP +3 HP.
NL 15. #bZero : #yRightClick the initial relic:Gain a summon card.
NL 16. #bFirst :Enemies drop an additional card reward with 1 additional card to choose from.
NL 17. #bSecond :Gain 2 Buffer .Gain [E]  [E] .
NL 18. #bThird :Play 3 cards at the top of draw pile.
NL 19. #bFourth :Next time you gain #yBUFF ,gain 4 extra.
NL 20. #bMUSIC :Triple the effect of your first drawn card this combat.
NL 21. #yALL #yMEMBER :no effect currently
NL 22. #rWatame&Haato :You can play summon cards without empty slots,and trigger #yStartLive .
NL 23. #yMatsuri&Luna :Give +1/+1 to summon cards in your draw pile.
NL 24. #yCoco&Kanata :Draw 5 cards.
NL 25. #yCN #ySecond :When vtubers die,they attack once.
NL 26. #yHololiveID :Increase 3 max HP.

Hololive_OneManArmy.NAME: One Syo-Jyo Army
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat,summon #pAqua ,reduce max slots to 1.If you control no vtubers,summon #pAqua every 3 turns.

Hololive_YagooBigFamily.FLAVOR: As you sow, so shall you reap..what`s this?

DESCRIPTIONS: When you draw,randomly change its *Damage , *Block , *MagicNumber , *Stats .
